name: WorkFlowy PLUS @ list bottom
description: Just like on mobile devices, now in the WorkFlowy browser app, you can hit a "+" sign at the bottom of any list to add a new bullet. The plus sign is barely visible until you hover over it. And its super-sized design makes it hard to miss :-)
